item.description: We will be doing a gift exchange. Please bring a wrapped gift: approx $15.00 in value. The gift should be some gift that you received that you don't want. If you don't have anything that qualifies, anything else will work. Game rules will be explained that evening. Afterward, we will play games. This is also a potluck, so bring over your favorite holiday entree, appetizer or dessert and your favorite games. I will email directions to those who RSVP YES.
item.name: Bad Santa Swap and Games
